Bind.definition: to make responsible for an obligation

1 a.definition: to make responsible for an obligation (as under a contract) [agents have the power to the insurer "R. I. Mehr"]

sub_terms.b: to burden with an obligation [prevented married women fromtheir property "J. H. Friedenthal"]

2.definition: to exert control overconstrain by legal authority [this court isby precedent]

3.definition: to bring (an insurance policy) into effect by an oral communication or a binder
